text: Argiope submaronica is a species of spider in the family Araneidae (orb- weavers), found from Mexico to Bolivia, and in Brazil. The name was at one time considered a synonym of Argiope argentata, but A. submaronica is now treated as a separate species. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Spiders of Mexico Category:Spiders of Central America Category:Spiders of South America Category:Spiders described in 1916
title: Argiope submaronica
